![](https://browse.arxiv.org/html/2402.14123v1/x1.png)

DeiSAM correctly identifies and segments objects given deictic prompts (top row), while the GroundedSAM often segments a wrong object or fails to identify an object (bottom rows). These results further illustrate the improvements of DeiSAM over the pure neural approach on reasoning tasks.
